resources.string: Your privacy is a fundamental human right.
* Although recommended for your downloads, you do not need a VPN to use FrostWire.

An unprotected connection means everything you do online (including searches, messaging, and downloads) may be monitored by anyone on your network and even by your Internet service provider.

We recommend using ExpressVPN to encrypt your connection and safeguard your privacy.

You\'re connected to the Internet using a VPN.

If you are not already, we recommend using ExpressVPN to encrypt your connection and safeguard your privacy.
All transfers will stop.\nAre you sure?
You\'re not connected to a Wi-Fi network.\n\nHow do you want to connect?
Your Wi-Fi connection has dropped. Stopping services.
The Wi-Fi network has changed. Restarting Services.
Use the icons to browse files.
FrostWire has downloaded a new PERFORMANCE UPDATE for you, please go ahead and touch the OK button if you want to install it now.
Enjoy the ad-free experience, support FrostWire
Please connect to use this feature
Try a valid port next time 1000 and 65500
Uh? I\'m still listening on port
This will cancel all ongoing and queued downloads. All transferred data will be lost. Are you sure?

Are you sure you want to go back to the home screen?
Check what types of files you\'d like to enable for sharing on the FrostWire Mobile Network and nearby Wi-Fi enabled Desktops.
Gotta have at least one upload slot
Only up to %s uploads at the same time
Thanks to all our voluntary alpha testers for the patience and great feedback, special thanks to
How other users will see you
Set how many Wi-fi sharing uploads you want to allow at the same time.
Pings will send your approximate Geo Location to find closest peers.
Long Press here to set the manual port number
Connect to local Wi-Fi peers via multicast (recommended)
Connect to local Wi-Fi peers via broadcast (more traffic on router)
Connect to remote peers on the Internet.
Tip: Rename files so they can be found
Use mobile network for BitTorrent downloads. Data Overage charges may apply. Use carefully.
Sorry, don\'t know how to open this file.
Touch any file title for batch actions
Finished downloads will be available to other FrostWire users on your Wi-Fi network.

Are you sure you want to delete the %s playlist
TPB is magnet based, works only on Wi-Fi
Monova is magnet based, works only on Wi-Fi
KAT is magnet based, works only on Wi-Fi
Yify is magnet based, works only on Wi-Fi
Are you sure you want to stop and remove this download from the list (no data will be erased)?
Are you sure you want to stop and remove this download from the list?
Are you sure you want to cancel this download (downloaded data so far will be erased)?
Waiting for other torrent(s) to Queue
Share pieces of torrent downloads with anybody on the internet via BitTorrent
Seeds only when connected via Wi-Fi to save bandwidth on your data plan
No Wi-fi available, Seeding has been turned off
Are you sure you want to download %1$s (%2$s)
Let\'s set you up before we begin.
How others see you on the local network (Wi-Fi)
BitTorrent users on the internet will be able to download file chunks of the data your torrents seed.
Seed only when using a Wi-Fi connection. Avoid extra charges from your carrier.
FrostWire is a peer-to-peer program for sharing authorized files only. Installing and using the program does not constitute a license for obtaining or distributing unauthorized content.
I will not use FrostWire for copyright infringement
Disconnected from BitTorrent. All BitTorrent transfers have stopped.
What are you looking for? (hints by Google)
This will clear out all the finished transfers
Download can\'t be created with SD card mounted
Show ads to support the development of this app.
The default storage location where files will be saved.
Could not share the file. Weird path found.
One file has been shared to FrostWire devices on the same Wi-Fi network.
%d files has been shared to FrostWire devices on the same Wi-Fi network.
Share files with peers on the local Wi-Fi network.
Thank you so much for Supporting FrostWire
Are you sure you want to delete the current track?
Wi-fi sharing is off. Wi-fi sharing can be used to share files locally between FrostWire powered devices connected to the same Wi-Fi network. Learn more.
Turning off Wi-Fi sharing will make all your locally shared files unavailable to other users on the nearby Wi-Fi network.
Send anonymous usage statistics. No information that can personally identify you will be stored on disk or sent through the network.
Player paused. (Tip: Press and hold to stop)
You need a Bitcoin wallet installed on you device to submit a BTC donation.
Please check the status of your internet connection before resuming.
The torrent transfer will start downloading automatically when you connect to a Wi-Fi network.(Check your Network Settings regarding 3G/4G data usage)
Torrent transfers will not start until you connect to a Wi-Fi network.(Check your Network Settings regarding 3G/4G data usage)
Warning: This torrent transfer is using your 3G/4G data. (Check your Network Settings if you wish to use BitTorrent only on WiFi)
Paste a magnet or torrent URL
Magnet URL added to transfers. (Magnets work best on Wi-Fi)
Sorry: Starting cloud downloads from here will be available on further updates.
The transfer has been paused because you are Disconnected. (Check your BitTorrent connection in Settings)
Cannot resume torrent transfers. Check status of "Settings" > "BitTorrent Connection Status"
Are you sure you want to download the following %1$s (%2$s)?
I can\'t open %1$s, the file does not exist.
Android will erase downloaded files if FrostWire is uninstalled.
You also have an SD card (%1$s free)
WARNING: All files saved by FrostWire onto the SD card will be deleted BY ANDROID, not FrostWire, if you uninstall the app.

I understand that all files downloaded to the SD Card by FrostWire will be deleted BY ANDROID the moment the FrostWire application is uninstalled from this device and I will not hold FrostWire LLC liable for any files lost.
This file was deleted from the SD card, or the SD card you have inserted is a different one.
This file belongs to an SD card, please insert it on your device.
This will shutdown all transfers and background services. Are you sure?
Save directory does not exist or can\'t be created
Temporary directory does not exist or can\'t be created

Use the Distributed Hash Table to announce/search torrent peers
Try FrostWire Plus for more results
If you love FrostWire please take a moment to rate us.
Sorry, FrostWire can\'t continue without your permission to access disk.
FrostWire will now restart for granted permissions to take effect

FrostWire is a file browser and downloader app, therefore it needs to be able to access your disk.

Without your permissions FrostWire cannot work.

Want to try again?
Your connection may not be private.
Show a permanent Android notification with status of transfers
The selected path is not a directory
FrostWire can\'t write on the selected storage path
Pick the files you want to download from this torrent
Bittorrent is disconnected. Would you like me to start it for you?
Seeding is currently disabled in your settings. Would you like me to enable seeding for you to share this file?
According to your settings I can\'t start seeding unless you are on Wi-Fi. The file will be ready for seeding automatically when you get back to an internet enabled Wi-Fi network.
The file could not be seeded. Enable seeding on settings.
The file could not be seeded. BitTorrent will remain disconnected.
The path you selected in the SD is not accessible any more. Press OK to select again.
Error: connection timed out/dropped. Try again.
Processing payment, refresh in a few seconds
